name: ServerLocation1
action:
<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(ACE Node in Cabinet Preference,Hardware Design Selection_ACE Node,Rack Mounting Type for_ACE Node,Node Supplier_ACE,Trusted Platform Module_TPM_ACE_Node,Additional Hard Disk _ACE,Optional DVD_ACE,ServerLocClusNetwork_Group desk)*>
[IF]([IN](<*VALUE(Interface with TPS Required?)*>,Yes,No,)){<*SETOPTIONAL(Additional Memory_ACE)*><*DISALLOWATTRIBUTES(Additional Memory_ACE)*>}{<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(Additional Memory_ACE)*><*SETREQUIRED(Additional Memory_ACE)*>}[ENDIF]
<*xDisallowallValuesExcept(ServerLocClusNetwork_Group desk:<* LIST ( SELECT AttValue FROM 
ClusterAttValues WHERE CAST (AttValueCode AS float) 
<= '<*CTX( Container(List of Locations/Clusters/Network Groups).Rows.GetCount )*>' ) *>)*>
